extensionDescription.message: Your personal wall against phishing. Simple, local and 100% open source.

popupErrorInternal.message: This extension does not work on internal browser pages

welcomeTrustedDesc.message: Mark sites you trust. They will have a green badge.

welcomeUnknownDesc.message: Sites you haven't marked yet appear with a yellow badge.

welcomeBlockedDesc.message: Dangerous sites are automatically blocked with a red badge.

welcomePinDesc.message: For the best experience, pin the ICheck icon to your toolbar. This way you'll instantly see the colored badge (‚úì green, ! yellow, ‚úï red) indicating the status of each site you visit.

welcomePinSteps.message: üìç Click the extensions icon (puzzle piece) in the top right corner ‚Üí Click the pin next to ICheck

welcomeChooseTitle.message: üöÄ How Do You Want to Start?

welcomeChooseDesc.message: We've prepared a list with 190+ safe sites (banks, government, social networks, e-commerce, etc) so you can start protected from day one.

welcomeOptionSafeListDesc.message: Start with 190+ trusted sites already marked

welcomeOptionEmptyDesc.message: Create your own custom list from the beginning

welcomeBenefit3.message: ‚úÖ Government sites (gov.br, Tax Authority, Social Security)

welcomeNote.message: üí° Note: You can always add or remove sites later in "Manage Lists"

welcomeFooter.message: üîí Your data stays 100% local in your browser

optionsIntroTitle.message: üõ°Ô∏è You're in Control of Your Security

optionsIntroDesc.message: Manage your lists of trusted and untrusted sites. All information is stored locally in your browser and is never sent to the internet.

optionsEmptyTrustedHint.message: Click the ICheck icon when visiting a site to mark it as trusted.

optionsEmptyUntrustedHint.message: Sites marked as untrusted will be automatically blocked.

optionsAboutDesc.message: ICheck is an active awareness tool against phishing. Instead of relying on third-party lists, you teach ICheck which sites are legitimate.

optionsAboutFeature1.message: 100% Local: Your data never leaves your computer

optionsAboutFeature2.message: 100% Open Source: Open and auditable code

optionsAboutFeature3.message: Educational: Creates the habit of checking URLs before entering data

contentBlockedMessage.message: You marked this site as UNTRUSTED

contentBlockedInfo.message: This site is on your personal block list.

optionsInvalidFile.message: Invalid file. The format must contain a "sites" array.

optionsReadError.message: Error reading file. Make sure it's a valid JSON file.

optionsClearAllMessage.message: Are you sure you want to remove ALL sites from your lists? This action cannot be undone.

optionsAskDesc.message: Show a popup asking if the site is trusted when you visit an unknown site.
